tasks.name: Real-time data ingest
tasks.description: Ingest streaming data with Eventstream from various sources.

tasks.name: Batch data ingest
tasks.description: Ingest batch data from a variety of sources with Pipeline and Dataflow.

tasks.name: Streaming data storage
tasks.description: Add the Eventhouse as destination store to collect the events from Eventstream and process real-time data on the fly.

tasks.name: Bronze layer
tasks.description: Consolidate and persist both batch and real-time data into the Lakehouse.

tasks.name: Monitoring dashboard
tasks.description: Build near real-time dashboard with the steaming data.

tasks.name: Clean and transform data
tasks.description: Transform and process the raw data into highly structured and high-quality data.

tasks.name: Silver layer
tasks.description: Maintain the refined data for subsequent analysis and consumption.

tasks.name: Data visualize
tasks.description: Create Power BI Reports to get data insights.

tasks.name: ML serving
tasks.description: Develop and train machine learning models.

tasks.name: Track data
tasks.description: Set up alerts on your report for alerting over the data.

tasks.name: Detect data
tasks.description: Detect and monitor streaming data with Activator, configuring automated actions as needed.

tasks.name: Prep for Analytics
tasks.description: Clean, transform, extract, and load your data for analysis and modeling tasks.

tasks.name: Gold layer
tasks.description: Maintain the refined data for subsequent analysis and consumption.

tasks.name: Initial Setup
tasks.description: These items are used to support initial setup

tasks.name: Framework Control
tasks.description: Items supporting the overall framework control, including storage of metadata and managing overall workflow

name: Lambda
description: Analyze your batch and real-time data in a single system efficiently and effectively, while still maintaining a clear separation between the two processing modes.
